price: 137.Nummah Siinik duma Yallih madqooqi dumi ummattal warrayteh moominiin koros Qeebit mokkoraamal, toysa moominiiney isin Baaxô Bagul gexaay Yallaa kee kay farmoyta dirabboyse marak ellecabo kah tekke inna wagita eile kas- kassowtaanamkeh.
arabic: قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ سُنَنٞ فَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qad khalat min qablikum sunanun fasīrū fī al-arḍi fa-unẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
